title: Ping acting strange
body: I average about 60-65 ping but yesterday it jumped to 140-160 and it has stayed there since. I reset my internet and found that it fixed the problem for about 5 minutes. This is less about "riots servers bla bla" and more a cry for help. I have no idea what might be causing this and i'm just wondering if anyone can help.

replies.body: If resetting your modem temporarily resolves it, then the issue may be caused by your modem in the first place. Have you contacted your ISP regarding the issue? If not, it may be a good idea so they can test your equipment and replace it, if it ends up being faulty.
ah thank you, i'll try that
